english.segment1: Chorus. (Almighty), Almighty, (Incredible), Incredible, (Amazing), Amazing, (Supernatural), Supernatural. (Wonderful), Wonderful, (Marvelous), Marvelous, (He Is), He Is, (He Is), He Is
english.segment2: Verse1. Let creation sing, let the people shout. For His goodness and his mercy. Let us praise Him now. Every knee shall bow. Every tongue proclaim. Giving glory to His Holy Name
english.segment3: Channel. He is the Lord over everything. And let all of creation proclaim, He Is
english.segment4: Verse2. Let the earth rejoice, let the people dance. To our Savior and Redeemer. We will lift our hands. He's the Lord of Lords and the King of Kings. Hallelujah, let creation sing
